metadata.title: CVE-2017-9545 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The next_text function in src/libmpg123/id3.c in mpg123 1.24.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via a crafted mp3 file. It was discovered that mpg123 incorrectly handled certain media files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.25.6-1').
